game.name: Overpass 2
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Shared/Split Screen PvP, Shared/Split Screen, Steam Achievements, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Identify the best routes and balance of power, speed and precision to overcome obstacles at the controls of a UTV, ATV or Rock Bouncer. In both solo and multiplayer mode, your talent and choices of technique will make the difference.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Identify the best routes and balance of power, speed and precision to overcome obstacles at the controls of a UTV, ATV or Rock Bouncer. In both solo and multiplayer mode, your talent and choices of technique will make the difference.

reviewHighlights.text: Physics are absolute trash, bought the deluxe for 4.99 and after 30 min requested a refund. This is the first game ive done that with, it was that ter...
The driving/racing isn't bad. I'm just not a fan of the team management aspects.
